name: Angelic LLC
description:
Welcome to Heaven!

Yes, unfortunately on your world you have passed on, but where one life ends another begins! And starting today, you have joined Angelic LLC, an astral company that prides itself on generating faith from the many worlds out there.

Faith allows us to keep the system going, and you'll be doing your part to continue it. You're just starting out as a trainee, but one day, if you complete your tasks, you'll end up as a full blown Angel! Exciting huh?

And don't worry about failing, you've already gotten here, so there's no chance of going to hell, unless you do something REALLY bad, but that hasn't happened in eons.... And we all remember what happened to Lucifer...

So let's get to generating that faith and earn you your wings!


Various in-game screenshots

Within the system

Game Created by Immersion Games
Game Designer & Programmer: Timothy Bush
Artist & Narrative Design: Lillian Bush
